english.segment1: Dont touch this. Just look and feel your way through. Cant tough this tempest just yet
english.segment2: The hopes and fears in the sirens sounding. Beating hearts, tears as the rain starts pounding
english.segment3: Comfort in stereo sirens warning. Still fighting, white lightning blinding, storming
english.segment4: Its not in me, but Ill recover it. Its not in me
english.segment5: Go run and hide as the storm comes in. Its never enough. Ill be alright and I wont let it in
english.segment6: Standing ground, standing with sirens waking. Firmly rooted, ever bending, never breaking
english.segment7: Its not in me, but Ill recover it. Its not in me
english.segment8: Go run and hide as the storm comes in. Its never enough. Ill be alright and I wont let it in
